name: Encaged (Gonbad, green.mermaid)
description:
*WARNING: LOUD NOISES AND JUMPSCARES*

You are a scientist. Your research is based on teleportation and interdimensional travel, thus discovering new worlds. Somehow you were successful, but now you don't know how to return to your own world. Desperate to find some answers to your many questions, you begin to explore this new world, hoping you'll find another form of life. However, that might not prove to be what you want...

Initially, you felt like you had fallen from the sky. In time you got used to the surroundings and your only fear remained the darkness. That's why you are always trying to find wooden sticks and dried grass, to create your own torches. 

After a long time, you find a strange device. You'll eventually decide if it's useful or not in your unexpected adventure. Good luck, you'll need it...

* Tip: To properly start the game, you will need the item found near your spawn location. Look for a group of rocks and leaves. *

CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

Left Shift: Sprint

Q: Cycle through inventory

E: Interact
